data.fullContent: One warm summer night, Angela went to a festival in her neighborhood. Bands were playing, and many people were happily dancing to the music. Angela walked along the streets of the festival, and looked at all the goods people were selling. After seeing everything, she bought a new sun hat.
data.answer: 一个温暖的夏夜，安琪拉去参加她所在社区的一个节日。乐队在演奏，群众和着音乐高兴地跳舞。安吉拉沿着节日的街道走着，看着人们在卖的所有商品。看完所有的东西后，她买了一顶新的太阳帽。
